ygData.subject: Hiya! (was: RE: [eqbards] RE: Whats your record? plus Velious bar d armor thread)
ygData.msgSnippet: Brilinnia!!!!  My friend!!!  :) Here I ve been on the eq_bards list for months and months, never suspecting you were here at eqbards! I quit EQ for a few
ygData.messageBody:
Brilinnia!!!! My friend!!! :)

Here I've been on the eq_bards list for months and months, never suspecting
you were here at eqbards!

I quit EQ for a few months, but I couldn't stay away. I'll have to remember
to re-add you to my friends list again, now that it's re-installed! :)

Talk to you soon!

Atonal Steelstring
Xegony
